items.sentence: Tom was one of the first people that I met when I moved to Boston.
Tom didn't want anyone to know that he couldn't understand French.
After the earthquake, the land value in this area went down a lot.
Americans are marrying later and having fewer children in general.
It makes no difference to me whether Tom comes to my party or not.
The train arrived at the station a half an hour ahead of schedule.
The gangs in Tom's neighborhood are engaged in a violent turf war.
Tom is a lying hypocrite who only cares about saving his own skin.
Tom saw Mary sitting by herself, so he went over to talk with her.
Tom and I are going hiking tomorrow. Would you like to go with us?
